name: Day One
description:
Welcome to the Day One Alpha! This project started out as a small test, but has become a cool little platformer so I wanted to share it with the community!

FEATURES

* Character Select

*Original Art and Music

* Points System

* Cash System

* Power Ups

* Old School Password Locked Levels

* Perma-Death

* Enemies

* Traps

* Puzzles

* And more!
